alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:54PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 353 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Divide, or 19 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodland Park, Manitou Springs, Green Mountain Falls, Divide, Crystola, Chipita Park and Cascade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
